remarks: Cyclically shifting a closed walk as word results in a closed walk as word (in an undirected graph).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 24-Mar-2018.)  (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Jun-2018.)
statement: clwwisshclww $p |- ( ( W e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ N e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) e. ( V ClWWalks E ) ) $.
